==English== {{wikipedia}} ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{bor|en|de|verstehen||understand, comprehend}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|en|/və(ɹ)ˈʃteɪ.ən/}} ===Noun=== {{en-noun|-}} # {{lb|en|sociology}} A [[stance]] that attempts to understand the [[meaning]] of [[action]] from the [[actor]]'s point of view, so that the actor is seen as a [[subject]] rather than an [[object]] of [[observation]]. ---- ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|verstān}}, {{m|gmh|virstēn}}, {{m|gmh|vorstēn}}, {{m|gmh|ferstān}}, from {{inh|de|goh|firstān}}, {{m|goh|firstēn}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*frastāną}}, equivalent to {{prefix|de|ver|stehen}}.
